cu.explanation_en: Setting NGU interface IP to unreachable subnet '10.0.0.1' will cause NG-U interface connection failure and GTP tunnel setup issues.

du.explanation_en: Setting DL frequency point A to match SSB frequency causes carrier frequency misalignment and cell search synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 DL 頻率點 A 設定為匹配 SSB 頻率會導致載波頻率錯位和細胞搜尋同步失敗。
